translation: Cross the moonlit desert.{#Name="説明文"}
source: Cross the moonlit desert.{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Defeat the enemy soldiers!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the enemy soldiers!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Defeat the enemies blocking your way!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the enemies blocking your way!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Defeat the enemies blocking your way!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the enemies blocking your way!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Defeat the enemies blocking your way!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the enemies blocking your way!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}
source: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}

translation: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}
source: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}

translation: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}
source: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}

translation: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}
source: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}

translation: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}
source: （リザーブ）{#Name="（リザーブ）"}

translation: It's her! Zero's here!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: It's her! Zero's here!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Attack! Attack!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Attack! Attack!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Uh...ah... Ahhhhhhh!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Uh...ah... Ahhhhhhh!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: The darkness is our ally, men! We know the lay of this land!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: The darkness is our ally, men! We know the lay of this land!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: We can't let anything happen to Lady Two!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: We can't let anything happen to Lady Two!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Right! We stop Zero here, no matter what!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Right! We stop Zero here, no matter what!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Dammit! Are these bastards immortal!?{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Dammit! Are these bastards immortal!?{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Get a medic over here! Mediiic!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Get a medic over here! Mediiic!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Who are we here to protect?{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Who are we here to protect?{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Lady Two, sir!{#Name="Soldiers C/D"}
source: Lady Two, sir!{#Name="Soldiers C/D"}

translation: And what is our ultimate mission?{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: And what is our ultimate mission?{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Victory, sir!{#Name="Soldiers C/D"}
source: Victory, sir!{#Name="Soldiers C/D"}

translation: Forward! Get a move on!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Forward! Get a move on!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: B-But sir, it's so c-cold...{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: B-But sir, it's so c-cold...{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: You call yourself a soldier, rookie!?{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: You call yourself a soldier, rookie!?{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Augh! It's colder than a brass tit out here!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Augh! It's colder than a brass tit out here!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Hey, you've been injured! Just sit still, okay?{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Hey, you've been injured! Just sit still, okay?{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Goddammit. I don't want to die in this darkness...{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Goddammit. I don't want to die in this darkness...{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: For Lady Twooooo!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: For Lady Twooooo!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: I'm not gonna lose! I'm not gonna lose! I'm not gonna loooose! {#Name="Soldier G"}
source: I'm not gonna lose! I'm not gonna lose! I'm not gonna loooose! {#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: It's nicer here at night, huh?{#Name="Zero"}
source: It's nicer here at night, huh?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Yeah. I got sand everywhere though.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Yeah. I got sand everywhere though.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Hard to believe it was so hot earlier.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Hard to believe it was so hot earlier.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: In my hair. In my cracks...{LF}Lots of sand in my cracks.{#Name="Dito"}
source: In my hair. In my cracks...{LF}Lots of sand in my cracks.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Enough already! How about I bury you{LF}in your precious sand, huh?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Enough already! How about I bury you{LF}in your precious sand, huh?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Lady Zero.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Lady Zero.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Yeah?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Yeah?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Fighting can still dehydrate you,{LF}even at low temperatures.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Fighting can still dehydrate you,{LF}even at low temperatures.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Please be mindful of your health at all times.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Please be mindful of your health at all times.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Thanks for the tip.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Thanks for the tip.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: That said, my mouth is kinda dry.{LF}And my head hurts...{#Name="Zero"}
source: That said, my mouth is kinda dry.{LF}And my head hurts...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Lady Zero, those are classic dehydration symptoms!{LF}You need water right away!{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Lady Zero, those are classic dehydration symptoms!{LF}You need water right away!{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: The hell is that?{#Name="Zero"}
source: The hell is that?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: What the hell? Why am I so cold right now?{#Name="Zero"}
source: What the hell? Why am I so cold right now?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I fear it's a hostile magic attack.{#Name="Octa"}
source: I fear it's a hostile magic attack.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: One that saps your bodily energy.{#Name="Octa"}
source: One that saps your bodily energy.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: I thought we were done with crap like this.{#Name="Dito"}
source: I thought we were done with crap like this.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Let's use the enemy's fires{LF}to keep warm as we move.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Let's use the enemy's fires{LF}to keep warm as we move.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: First it's hot as hell, and now it's cold as balls.{#Name="Zero"}
source: First it's hot as hell, and now it's cold as balls.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Perhaps a little game of bury the{LF}sandworm would warm you up!{#Name="Octa"}
source: Perhaps a little game of bury the{LF}sandworm would warm you up!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Dear old Octa can heat your{LF}insides to the boiling point...{#Name="Octa"}
source: Dear old Octa can heat your{LF}insides to the boiling point...{#Name="Octa"}

translation: I think your brain is boiling, old man.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I think your brain is boiling, old man.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: S-So cold... C-Can't talk... T-Teeth chattery...{#Name="Dito"}
source: S-So cold... C-Can't talk... T-Teeth chattery...{#Name="Dito"}

translation: You sure talk a lot for a guy{LF}who says he can't talk. {#Name="Zero"}
source: You sure talk a lot for a guy{LF}who says he can't talk. {#Name="Zero"}

translation: Indeed!{#Name="Octa"}
source: Indeed!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Yes, do please be quiet.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Yes, do please be quiet.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Whatever, you fu—{#Name="Dito"}
source: Whatever, you fu—{#Name="Dito"}

translation: You seem unfazed, Decadus. Aren't you cold?{#Name="Zero"}
source: You seem unfazed, Decadus. Aren't you cold?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I am, my lady. Cold and physically exhausted.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: I am, my lady. Cold and physically exhausted.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Theeen why do you look so happy?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Theeen why do you look so happy?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You know why? 'Cause he's a freak{LF}who likes having his junk—{#Name="Dito"}
source: You know why? 'Cause he's a freak{LF}who likes having his junk—{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Sorry, I didn't quite get that.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Sorry, I didn't quite get that.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Hiding my true desires from them...{LF}Such a devious game!{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Hiding my true desires from them...{LF}Such a devious game!{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: You know, I'm actually not cold at all.{#Name="Cent"}
source: You know, I'm actually not cold at all.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: This kind of cold simply isn't enough{LF}to affect a man of my caliber.{#Name="Cent"}
source: This kind of cold simply isn't enough{LF}to affect a man of my caliber.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: So why's your nose runnin'{LF}like a fountain, then, huh?{#Name="Dito"}
source: So why's your nose runnin'{LF}like a fountain, then, huh?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Oh ho! I wager these sorcerers{LF}are the source of our cold snap!{#Name="Octa"}
source: Oh ho! I wager these sorcerers{LF}are the source of our cold snap!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Then let's go tear 'em a new one!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Then let's go tear 'em a new one!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: 然り{#Name="オクタ"}
source: 然り{#Name="オクタ"}

translation: ゼロ、殺っちゃえ！　殺っちゃえ！{#Name="ディト"}
source: ゼロ、殺っちゃえ！　殺っちゃえ！{#Name="ディト"}

translation: ああ。さっさと済まそう{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: ああ。さっさと済まそう{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: Finally down...{#Name="Zero"}
source: Finally down...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: That should take care of this cold spell.{#Name="Octa"}
source: That should take care of this cold spell.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Ugh! I'm getting sick of this!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Ugh! I'm getting sick of this!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I surmise that spirits have taken{LF}control of these undead soldiers.{#Name="Octa"}
source: I surmise that spirits have taken{LF}control of these undead soldiers.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: There must be necromancers nearby.{#Name="Octa"}
source: There must be necromancers nearby.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: This gets more annoying by the minute.{#Name="Zero"}
source: This gets more annoying by the minute.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: This gets more annoying by the minute.{#Name="Zero"}
source: This gets more annoying by the minute.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: What are you standing around for!? Kill 'em!{#Name="Zero"}
source: What are you standing around for!? Kill 'em!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: All these temperature fluxes{LF}are messin' with my health...{#Name="Dito"}
source: All these temperature fluxes{LF}are messin' with my health...{#Name="Dito"}

translation: I'LL mess with your health if you don't get moving!{#Name="Zero"}
source: I'LL mess with your health if you don't get moving!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I'm fighting! I'm totally fighting! Watch me go!{#Name="Dito"}
source: I'm fighting! I'm totally fighting! Watch me go!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: What's all the fuss about, Octa?{#Name="Zero"}
source: What's all the fuss about, Octa?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Hmm? I don't know of any fuss?{#Name="Octa"}
source: Hmm? I don't know of any fuss?{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Oh, you don't, do you?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Oh, you don't, do you?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Then what's with the sudden{LF}broom handle in your pants?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Then what's with the sudden{LF}broom handle in your pants?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Oh ho! You discovered my secret, did you!?{#Name="Octa"}
source: Oh ho! You discovered my secret, did you!?{#Name="Octa"}

translation: I was just engaging in some{LF}dirty thoughts while fighting.{#Name="Octa"}
source: I was just engaging in some{LF}dirty thoughts while fighting.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Well, knock it off and concentrate already!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Well, knock it off and concentrate already!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Forced to fight even after death.{LF}Such a horrid fate.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Forced to fight even after death.{LF}Such a horrid fate.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Really? I'd think you'd be into that sort of thing.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Really? I'd think you'd be into that sort of thing.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Think about it! Zero could keep kicking and{LF}punching and slicing you even AFTER you die!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Think about it! Zero could keep kicking and{LF}punching and slicing you even AFTER you die!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Even...after I die? Unnngh...{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Even...after I die? Unnngh...{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: You know, I could take these foes down{LF}with a single thumb. A single thumb!{#Name="Cent"}
source: You know, I could take these foes down{LF}with a single thumb. A single thumb!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Buuut I won't. That would just spoil the fun. {#Name="Cent"}
source: Buuut I won't. That would just spoil the fun. {#Name="Cent"}

translation: If you can do it, then do it already!{#Name="Zero"}
source: If you can do it, then do it already!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Nngh...rrgh...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Nngh...rrgh...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: What's wrong? You cold?{#Name="Zero"}
source: What's wrong? You cold?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I...I don't know.{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: I...I don't know.{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: He does not seem to be in the best of health.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: He does not seem to be in the best of health.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Why's everybody worried about that big crybaby?{#Name="Dito"}
source: Why's everybody worried about that big crybaby?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: I'm a hell of a lot worse off than him right now!{#Name="Dito"}
source: I'm a hell of a lot worse off than him right now!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: It's purely a matter of character, I'd say.{#Name="Octa"}
source: It's purely a matter of character, I'd say.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Indeed. Mikhail has a charming{LF}innocence about him. You...do not.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Indeed. Mikhail has a charming{LF}innocence about him. You...do not.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Oh, for hell's sake! He can't{LF}even tell if he's cold or not!{#Name="Dito"}
source: Oh, for hell's sake! He can't{LF}even tell if he's cold or not!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: That dumb lizard's gonna be just fine.{#Name="Dito"}
source: That dumb lizard's gonna be just fine.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: How many times do we have to go through this!?{#Name="Zero"}
source: How many times do we have to go through this!?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Over and OVER again... I'm sick of it!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Over and OVER again... I'm sick of it!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Zero? Hey, Zero! I think I feel cold, Zero!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Zero? Hey, Zero! I think I feel cold, Zero!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Really? I'm surprised you feel anything{LF}through that thick head of yours.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Really? I'm surprised you feel anything{LF}through that thick head of yours.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Trivia time! Did you know ice baths{LF}actually warm you up if—{#Name="Cent"}
source: Trivia time! Did you know ice baths{LF}actually warm you up if—{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Shut up, Cent.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Shut up, Cent.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Why don't we retreat for a bit so we can recover?{#Name="Octa"}
source: Why don't we retreat for a bit so we can recover?{#Name="Octa"}

translation: I'm not sure...we can...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: I'm not sure...we can...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Ooof. It does seem this area is{LF}enclosed by magical power...{#Name="Octa"}
source: Ooof. It does seem this area is{LF}enclosed by magical power...{#Name="Octa"}

translation: That must be what's holding in the cold.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: That must be what's holding in the cold.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Goddammit. I'll kill every{LF}last sorcerer around here!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Goddammit. I'll kill every{LF}last sorcerer around here!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Zero...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Zero...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: It's all right. This won't take long.{#Name="Zero"}
source: It's all right. This won't take long.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: くっ……くくく。{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: くっ……くくく。{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: We're gonna kill every asshole{LF}who played a part in this.{#Name="Zero"}
source: We're gonna kill every asshole{LF}who played a part in this.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Sorcerers... Soldiers... Intoners... Everyone.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Sorcerers... Soldiers... Intoners... Everyone.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: If they run, they die.{LF}If they surrender, they still die!{#Name="Zero"}
source: If they run, they die.{LF}If they surrender, they still die!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: We're gonna paint the walls with their blood!{#Name="Zero"}
source: We're gonna paint the walls with their blood!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I've had enough of you jackasses{LF}and your stupid magic circles!{#Name="Zero"}
source: I've had enough of you jackasses{LF}and your stupid magic circles!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Go ahead and run! You're all gonna die either way!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Go ahead and run! You're all gonna die either way!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: GYAAAAAAAAAH!{#Name="Zero"}
source: GYAAAAAAAAAH!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Good heavens! What an oafish{LF}display of aggression!{#Name="Cent"}
source: Good heavens! What an oafish{LF}display of aggression!{#Name="Cent"}

translation: My lady, perhaps we could let the fleeing{LF}enemies go? They are no danger to us.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: My lady, perhaps we could let the fleeing{LF}enemies go? They are no danger to us.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: No can do.{#Name="Zero"}
source: No can do.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: My lady, perhaps we could let the fleeing{LF}enemies go? They are no danger to us.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: My lady, perhaps we could let the fleeing{LF}enemies go? They are no danger to us.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: No can do.{#Name="Zero"}
source: No can do.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Hurry up and die! I'm in a rush here!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Hurry up and die! I'm in a rush here!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You sons of bitches just don't know when to quit.{#Name="Zero"}
source: You sons of bitches just don't know when to quit.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: The cold? The heat? The sand?{LF}It's all your fuckin' fault!{#Name="Zero"}
source: The cold? The heat? The sand?{LF}It's all your fuckin' fault!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I don't think they're responsible{LF}for the SAND, actually...{#Name="Dito"}
source: I don't think they're responsible{LF}for the SAND, actually...{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Hey, we're all good now. Okay?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Hey, we're all good now. Okay?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Okay...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Okay...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: What's wrong?{#Name="Zero"}
source: What's wrong?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: What the hell is this?{#Name="Zero"}
source: What the hell is this?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Divergence: Branch C{#Name="Accord"}
source: Divergence: Branch C{#Name="Accord"}

translation: April the 13th, 1000 A.D.{#Name="Accord"}
source: April the 13th, 1000 A.D.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: I've observed an extremely worrisome branch.{#Name="Accord"}
source: I've observed an extremely worrisome branch.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: When the singularity known as Two captured the dragon Mikhail,{#Name="Accord"}
source: When the singularity known as Two captured the dragon Mikhail,{#Name="Accord"}

translation: I detected her imposing some kind of magical influence upon him.{#Name="Accord"}
source: I detected her imposing some kind of magical influence upon him.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Until now, only Zero could enact such influence.{LF}This is the first known exception,{#Name="Accord"}
source: Until now, only Zero could enact such influence.{LF}This is the first known exception,{#Name="Accord"}

translation: and as such, increases the likelihood{LF}of an unforeseen accident occurring.{#Name="Accord"}
source: and as such, increases the likelihood{LF}of an unforeseen accident occurring.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: This matter must be prioritized for careful observation.{#Name="Accord"}
source: This matter must be prioritized for careful observation.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: M4110_E0020_DM: Begin Recording{#Name="Accord"}
source: M4110_E0020_DM: Begin Recording{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Here they are. The root of all this evil.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Here they are. The root of all this evil.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: The root of all this evil?{LF}Seriously, Z. Who talks like that?{#Name="Dito"}
source: The root of all this evil?{LF}Seriously, Z. Who talks like that?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Shut up and fight!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Shut up and fight!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I've had enough of you jackasses{LF}and your stupid magic circles!{#Name="Zero"}
source: I've had enough of you jackasses{LF}and your stupid magic circles!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Go ahead and run! You're all gonna die either way!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Go ahead and run! You're all gonna die either way!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: 寒すぎる！　クソ！　死ね！{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: 寒すぎる！　クソ！　死ね！{#Name="ゼロ"}
